com.ibm.xasdi_bridge.message

Class MessageRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.xasdi_bridge.message.MessageRepository

  • public class MessageRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Large unit of Message repository.

      • MessageRepository

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp(int placenum)
        Create small unit of repository. This method should be called just after constructor.
        Parameters:
        placenum - The number of X10 Place

      • sendToReply

        public void sendToReply(boolean sendReply)
        Set the destination of Message. This method should be called only XASDI runtime.
        Parameters:
        sendReply - If true, Message will be sent to MessageQueue of reply. If false, for CitizenProxy.

      • setRegion

        public void setRegion(Region region)
        Bind Region object to this repository.
        Parameters:
        region - Region owns this repository.

      • setResolver

        public void setResolver(MessageResolver resolver)
        Bind MessageResolver to this repository.
        Parameters:
        resolver - MessageResolver bound to this repository.

      • getCitizenMsgQ

        public MessageQueue getCitizenMsgQ(int pid)
        Get a MessageQueue for Citizen agents sent to a X10 Place.
        Parameters:
        pid - Destination X10 PlaceID
        Returns:
        MessageQueue sent to selected X10 Place

      • getDriverMsgQ

        public MessageQueue getDriverMsgQ(int pid)
        Get a MessageQueue for Driver agents sent to a X10 Place.
        Parameters:
        pid - Destination X10 PlaceID
        Returns:
        MessageQueue sent to selected X10 Place

      • getMoveCitizenMessages

        public MessageList getMoveCitizenMessages()
        Get a list of messages contain Movable data.
        Returns:
        MessageList contain Movable data

        public void clearMoveCitizenMessages()
        Clear all messages for Citizen agent.

        Get a list of new citizen set created in this X10 Place.
        Returns:
        newCitizenSet

      • addMessage

        public Message addMessage(Message msg)
        Add a Message to this repository.
        Parameters:
        msg - Message to be added
        Returns:
        If this message is null or destination is null, return null. Otherwise, return Message to be added.

      • addCitizen

        public void addCitizen(long cid,
              int pid)
        add CitizenID to World.
        Parameters:
        cid - ID of Citizen to be added
        pid - X10 Place ID

      • removeCitizen

        public void removeCitizen(long cid)
        remove CitizenID from World.
        Parameters:
        cid - ID of Citizen to be removed

      • addMessage

        public Message addMessage(CitizenID cid,
                 Message msg)
        Add message to the repository. Destination CitizenID is set manually (without MessageResolver)
        Parameters:
        cid - destination CitizenID
        msg - Message object to be sent
        Returns:
        the same Message object

      • addBroadcastMessage

        public Message addBroadcastMessage(Message msg)
        Add message to the repository for all X10 Places. Destination is set for broadcat (without MessageResolver)
        Parameters:
        msg - Message object to be sent
        Returns:
        the same Message object

      • checkRemoteMessages

        public void checkRemoteMessages(MessageQueue msgq,
                       int remotepid)
        Called when receiving list of messages from a different X10 Place to register remote citizen ID.
        Parameters:
        msgs - List of messages
